title: [HiFi|Scan] Micronauts 01-12 + Bonus (Marvel|1979|HR|Bchry-DCP)
description:
gesserit presents:

   A Hitlist Fills Torrent ( <a href=" http://thepiratebay.se/torrent/9591710" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW"> http://thepiratebay.se/torrent/9591710</a>  ):

      A Collection of Traditionally Scanned releases:



         Micronauts 001-012 (1979) (HR-1680) (Bchry-DCP)

         Micronauts Special Edition 01-04 (1983-1984) (Wrap Covers Only) (Bchry-DCP)
         Micronauts Special Edition 05    (1984)                         (Bchry-DCP)



        <a href=" http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Micronauts_%28comics%29#Marvel_Comics" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW"> http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Micronauts_%28comics%29#Marvel_Comics</a>

         There were two sets of Bchry releases for these first dozen issues:
         A higher-res one, created by disassembling a trade volume (not sure which,
         comicbookdb doesn't list any), and a lower-res one of the 1983/4 "Special
         Edition" reprints, each issue of which collects 2 1/2 of the original
         instalments (go figure). The former are the actual HiFis, and I would of
         course have picked those anyway, but have here included the covers created
         exclusively for the latter, as well as the last, which includes a bonus
         story to fill up the half-issue's worth of content otherwise unaccounted
         for (because 5 times 2 1/2 is 12 1/2, see how that works) in its entirety.
